description: Manages physical attributes of interfaces on HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

description.description: Specifies an interface description. The value is a string of 1 to 242 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported but question marks (?) not supported.

interface_type.description: Interface type to be configured from the device.

state.description: Specify desired state of the resource.

admin_state.description: Specifies the interface management status. The value is an enumerated type. up, An interface is in the administrative Up state. down, An interface is in the administrative Down state.

mode.description: Manage Layer 2 or Layer 3 state of the interface.

interface.description: Full name of interface, i.e. 40GE1/0/10, Tunnel1.

l2sub.description: Specifies whether the interface is a Layer 2 sub-interface.
